Summary: orange/yellow lights in the northern sky
divs: sighting detailsi was walking the dog, when i looked up in the northern sky and saw orange\yellow glowing light appear. they would build in intensity from a faint glow to very bright, blink once or twice then disappear. i saw as many as three at one time in the sky. this went on for almost a half an hour over a wide area of the northern sky. very similar to what was reported from indy and also what was reported earlier this month in texas. however there were a lot of jets in the sky chasing the lights. as soon as the lights appeared two jets would converge on the spot. the light would disappear and the jets would return to what looked like a search pattern. i called a friend that lives three miles north of me. they went outside and saw the very same thing
trends: There have been no other sightings in Thorntown
This sighting has never been favorited.
